ComicInfo.Title: Gobs of Worms; Sappho's Daughter; Cellar Dweller; Plate Job; She Crawls on Her Belly Like a Reptile; Born Again; The Midnight Monster; The Martyrdom of St. Steven of Lawrence; Insomnia Angst
ComicInfo.Summary:
1. Insomnia Angst (by S. Clay Wilson)
2. The Martyrdom of St. Steven of Lawrence (by Justin Green)
3. The Midnight Monster (by Rory Hayes)
4. Born Again (by Kim Deitch)
5. She Crawls on Her Belly Like a Reptile (by Roger Brand)
6. Plate Job (by Spain Rodriguez)
7. Cellar Dweller (by Charles Dallas)
8. Sappho's Daughter (by Larry Todd)
9. Gobs of Worms (by Jack Jackson : inside back cover)
10. Orville Willis Tastes the Revenge of the Dismal Swamp Terrapins (by Joe Schenkman : on back cover)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-16 08:24:23. [CVDB359807]
